line_1: See, how the sturdy peasants stride,
How strong, how large, the num'rous Heroes stride!
line_2: What Length of Lance they shake with warlike Pride!

line_1: SOMETIMES, he, with an awkard stride,
line_2: Would lift his legs, from side to side;

line_1: Her giant Genius takes a mighty stride,
line_2: And sets his foot beyond th' incroaching tide;
What time by thee scholastic Pride

line_1: Assume the pompous port, the martial stride;
line_2: LAUGHS not the heart, when Giants, big with pride,

line_1: Here dreadful Whales the Blust'ring Tritons stride,
line_2: And raise a Silver Tempest as they glide:

line_1: Spans the pale nations with colossal stride,
line_2: — High rears the Fiend his grinning jaws, and wide

line_1: You taught to hunt the Shark, and boldly stride
line_2: The flouncing Horse, and quell his foamy Pride.

line_1: Firmly he strove to tread, and with a stride
line_2: Which shew'd at once his weakness and his pride,

line_1: The creature takes his haughty stride,
line_2: Mark, with what insolence and pride
Our fav'rite hopes, that swiftly glide,

line_1: Stalks o'er the earth with Giant stride;
line_2: When MURDER, RAPINE by her side,

line_1: And mends the measure of his stride:
line_2: It glads the heart-glow of my guide,

line_1: In Regal Garments now I gravely stride,
line_2: Aw'd by the Persian Dam'sel's haughty Pride.

line_1: And Vice came onward with a larger stride:
line_2: Emerg'd the Demon of tyrannic pride,

line_1: I love the aukward courser's stride,
line_2: The courser that has been well tried,
